about_the_game:
One sweep clears the Central Plains ,Western fiends retreat in chains
Prepare for bonds, our hearts to bring ,Together we brave this journey's ring

The Millennium Catastrophe: A Reunion of Destinies

The story takes place a thousand years after the four disciples of the Journey to the West returned from their pilgrimage, specifically during the twelfth year of the Chongzhen Emperor of the Ming Dynasty (1639 AD). After a millennium of spreading the Mahayana sutras throughout the Central Plains, demons from the West began to wreak havoc, seeking to seize these precious scriptures. The Central Plains were plunged into disaster, yet the celestial gods and Buddhas remained indifferent. To save the world and unravel the secrets behind the scriptures, the four disciples of the Journey to the West decided to descend to the mortal realm once more. Together, they battled the demons and searched for the original scriptures scattered across the Central Plains, hoping to uncover the "unspeakable

secrets" hidden within.

The Ink Melody of Mountains and Rivers: A Poetic Visual World

The game features a Chinese-style ink painting art style, with expressive visuals full of Oriental charm. The story's scenes are inspired by real scenic spots, allowing you to experience the unique and beautiful landscapes of this ancient land through the game.

Four United Hearts: Demon-Slaying Adventure

Join forces with other players to form the Journey to the West quartet and embark on an adventurous journey together. Search for treasures, defeat monsters, and face numerous challenging levels as a team. By fighting side by side, you will build deep bonds of friendship and together write your own legendary story.

Air combat, somersault and cloud dance

The gameplay of aerial combat is revolutionary, allowing you to fly in the air and fight monsters in the air. Each Journey to the West hero has unique flying movements. Use various skills and movements in conjunction with the flying movements to form aerial combat combos, elegant flying combat, and also Feel the excitement of flying combat smoothly. At the same time, the flying gameplay also allows you to cross mountains and rivers, fly over villages and cities, giving you an unprecedented flying experience, allowing you to experience unlimited freedom and fun during your adventure journey.

Five Elements and Infinite Freedom

Based on the Five Elements and Bagua of ancient Chinese culture, you can freely craft unique artifacts to enhance your combat abilities. The game also offers a variety of vibrant hero appearances, allowing you to customize your character's appearance according to personal preferences. With these flexible settings, every player can create their own unique Journey to the West hero and embark on an unprecedented personalized adventure.

 Undersea adventure, treasure hunting

Not only on land and in the air, you can also team up with your friends to dive into the bottom of the sea to find hidden treasure boxes and obtain rare treasures. At the same time, there are also various traps hidden under the sea. You need to work together to avoid the traps, and finally find treasure

----------------The recommended game control method is keyboard and mouse----------------
